Articles.Content:
Hi,

Welcome to Science & Spaceflight, a place to discuss all things pertaining to science and general geekdom. This is much like The Lounge, except there is a bit of a topic of sorts.

KSP talk is allowed, as long as it's founded in geeky and/or scientific notions... Otherwise, it probably goes in General Discussion.

Goes without saying, no spam and postcount-padding allowed here, or anywhere for that matter. All usual forum rules apply.

So, that's about it I think. Come on in and let loose your inner nerd!

Cheers
Yay! Now we won't get as many of these topics in Off-Topic XD

Yes, this is the place for all those "not exactly about KSP but not entirely off-topic either" type posts.

Cheers
